text: "If Her Lovin' Don't Kill Me" is a song first recorded by American country music artist Aaron Tippin. It was released in August 2002 as the second single from the album Stars & Stripes. The song reached #40 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by John Rich, Vicky McGehee, and Tim Womack, then a member of Sons of the Desert. ==John Anderson version== The song was recorded by American country music artist John Anderson and released in August 2006 as the first single from his album Easy Money. The song reached No. 59 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart. ==Chart performance== ===Aaron Tippin=== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2002) !Peak position |- |} ===John Anderson=== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2006) !Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2002 songs Category:2002 singles Category:2006 singles Category:Aaron Tippin songs Category:John Anderson (musician) songs Category:Songs written by Vicky McGehee Category:Songs written by John Rich Category:Song recordings produced by John Rich Category:Lyric Street Records singles Category:Warner Records singles
title: If Her Lovin' Don't Kill Me
